item.title: LTV of a service
The rationale behind A/B testing
item.description: A few days ago, while having a casual conversation over a beer, I was totally shocked when I heard something close to: “A/B testing is pointless on small project like ours because testing overhead is too high”. Is it? Let’s run the numbers :) Assumptions: The product costs X to operate monthly. 70% of the costs are development team, and 30% is administrative overhead and other costs like infrastructure, customer support and marketing expenses.
